activities: AeroFS may collect personal information from its users, including those who reside in the EU or Switzerland, such as username, first and last name, email addresses, organization or team, credit card or other payment method information, telephone numbers, home, business, and/or billing postal addresses, and email contacts when the user registers for an account or corresponds with us. AeroFS also collects information through technology, such as cookies, web beacons or other tracking tools, which we use to provide our service and to analyze and improve customer experience.  AeroFS is a file-sharing system, which allows users to create libraries of data on a local device and to share that data with other users.  Accordingly, we may collect information through a user’s use of the Service, but we strive to collect the minimum amount of information necessary to provide the service.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Collection of personally identifiable information and third party personally identifiable information,  credit card information.
